trans-unit.source: Represents the base class from which all implementations of asymmetric signature formatters derive.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklassen som avledet alle implementeringer av asymmetriske signatur formaterere.

trans-unit.source: Asymmetric signature formatters create digital signatures that are verified using implementations of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter>.
trans-unit.target: Asymmetriske signatur formaterere opprette signaturer som er bekreftet ved hjelp av implementeringer av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette en forekomst av en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: Application code will create a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Programmet koden vil opprette en ny forekomst av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use implementations of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling an implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk implementeringer av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>til å angi nøkkel og hash-algoritmen før du kaller en implementering av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates the signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, oppretter du signaturen for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en nøkkel og en nummeralgoritme før du kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som skal signeres.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the rgbHash parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den digitale signaturen for den rgbHash parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Creates the signature from the specified hash value.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter signaturen fra den angitte hash-verdien.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the hash algorithm to be used, then returns the signature of the input hash algorithm value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir hash-koden algoritmen som skal brukes, returnerer signaturen for verdien for inndata hash-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to create the signature.
trans-unit.target: Nummeralgoritmen skal brukes til å opprette signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The signature for the specified hash value.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen for den angitte hash-verdien.

trans-unit.source: The hash parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The hash parameter is .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the hash algorithm to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, angir du hash-algoritmen som brukes for å opprette signaturen.

trans-unit.source: You must set a hash algorithm before calling an implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en nummeralgoritme før du kaller en implementering av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på hash-algoritmen som brukes for å opprette signaturen.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the asymmetric algorithm to use to create the signature.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, angir du asymmetriske algoritmen som skal brukes til å opprette signaturen.

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling an implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en nøkkel før du kaller en implementering av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the implementation of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> to use to create the signature.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av implementeringen av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> skal brukes til å opprette signaturen.
